alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 12:16AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, east central Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1216 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Pierson, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Salt Springs, Fruitland, Beverly Beach, Espanola and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler
